Singapore Geospatial Challenge

Business Analytics Mania 2016

University Town | 3-4 September


Look into the heart of data
determine the best place to be

About

Singapore GeoSpatial Challange Business Analytics Mania (SGCBAM) is a nationwide competition which aims to introduce the use of Data Analytics tools for business organisations to students, giving them an opportunity to learn business analytics tools to move Singapore towards becoming a Smart Nation.

The Challenge

Ever wondered where to set-up the next cafe down the road, or the shop that gets everyone talking? Make the smart choice using the data you have. As a potential business owner, it is up to you to choose the optimal location for selling your products.

Prizes

All participants in the challenge will receive certificates of participation. Outstanding teams also have an opportunity to win attractive prizes!
1st
 $2000
2nd
 $1500
3rd
 $1000
Hello

Eligibility

Only pre-university students are allowed to participate.

Fees

No registration fee. Come down to learn with everyone!

Teams

Form teams of 3 from the same institution to compete!

What You Need

Your own laptop is required! Charging ports will be provided.
